abstract: There are several options for transferring handwritten notes to your computer, including some that will convert the notes to text.
snippet: There are several options for transferring handwritten notes to your computer, including some that will convert the notes to text.
lead_paragraph: Q. I am a psychiatrist and would like to handwrite my notes and then have a program convert them into text that I can save to my computer. The Livescribe pen does not fill the bill, but I hear the Apple iPad has an application called Note Taker HD. I have not been able to try the app, but would it work for what I want? What about a Lenovo tablet?

headline.main: Taking Notes, and Saving as Digital Text
